originalText.text: Had a bad experience with my finalized material not being delivered. Disappointed with the lack of communication, especially when our wedding was in October 2019 and it is now February 2024.

text.text: Had a bad experience with my finalized material not being delivered. Disappointed with the lack of communication, especially when our wedding was in October 2019 and it is now February 2024.

originalText.text: We are so in love with the perfection of ARP films. If you want the best photographs to remember your special day, this is the photographer for you. Professional, funny, entertaining and just made the day a blast. I am very lucky. Thank you ARP films.

text.text: We are so in love with the perfection of ARP films. If you want the best photographs to remember your special day, this is the photographer for you. Professional, funny, entertaining and just made the day a blast. I am very lucky. Thank you ARP films.

originalText.text: This person is the biggest fraud. He took our money, did not deliver our videos and lied to us for 2 years. We gave no videos of our wedding - a very  important milestone in our lives, our parents are so sad and distressed, and this guy does not even have the decency to apologize, give our money back, or explain himself. He’s gone on to try to delete us all on forms of social media, blocked our numbers, and does not reply to email. His name is Jay Arora - please be aware, and if anyone has any information on him, please do let me know.

originalText.text: Wow!! Just look at their works ,look at the testimonial! Amazing!! They are capturing the moments that live years and years. So professional, yet so beautiful. I would recommend ARP Films who wants to see magic and imagination being fusion.

originalText.text:
my wife  and I just got married and we decided to pick ARP FILMS for our wedding. we were really happy with such as phenomenal photographers! .
We have no words to express our happiness !
